name: HMCameraStreamControl
desc: An object that can start and stop the camera stream and contains the view into which the stream is rendered.

items.name: class HMCameraStream
items.desc: An object that represents a camera's audiovisual stream.

items.name: var streamState: HMCameraStreamState
items.desc: The current state of the camera stream.

items.name: enum HMCameraStreamState
items.desc: The states associated with a camera stream.

items.name: var delegate: HMCameraStreamControlDelegate?
items.desc: Delegate that receives updates as the camera stream changes.

items.name: protocol HMCameraStreamControlDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that gives the delegate updates on the camera stream.
